warranty_policy_description: Siamtech Online Group CO., LTD. ("Company") provides a one-year limited warranty for all its products, covering manufacturing defects in materials and workmanship under normal use. The warranty period begins from the date of purchase.
coverage_details_list_1: One-year limited warranty for all products
coverage_details_list_2: Covers manufacturing defects in materials and workmanship
coverage_details_list_3: Valid only under normal use conditions
coverage_details_list_4: Warranty period begins from the date of purchase
activate_warranty_description: Ready to activate your warranty? Sign in to your account and register your product to get started.
extended_warranty_description: Protect your investment further with our extended warranty plans:
premium_protection_description: Extends coverage to 2 years with priority service
our_story_content: From our humble beginnings in Bangkok, SIAMTECH has evolved into a leading provider of professional audio equipment and accessories. What started as a small shop in the heart of Thailand has grown into an international brand trusted by audio professionals, content creators, and enthusiasts worldwide.
our_mission_content: Our mission is to democratize access to professional-grade audio equipment. We believe that quality sound shouldn't be a luxury, but a standard. Through innovative products and exceptional service, we're making professional audio accessible to everyone who shares our passion for perfect sound.
join_journey_description: Whether you're a professional audio engineer, a content creator, or simply passionate about quality sound, we invite you to be part of our story. Let's create the future of audio together.

register_product_description: Enter your product details and proof of purchase information.
activate_warranty_step_description: Complete the registration to activate your 1-year warranty coverage.

terms_agreement: By signing up you agree to our
warranty_registration_description: Please fill in your product details to activate the warranty
faq_coverage_answer: Our one-year limited warranty covers manufacturing defects in materials and workmanship under normal use conditions. The warranty period begins from the date of purchase.
faq_period_question: How long is the warranty period?
faq_period_answer: All SIAMTECH products come with a one-year limited warranty from the date of purchase. Extended warranty options may be available for select products.
faq_claim_question: How do I make a warranty claim?
faq_claim_answer: To claim the warranty, you must: 1) Contact our support team at support@siamtechonline.com with proof of purchase (receipt or invoice), 2) Provide a detailed description of the issue, including photos or videos if applicable, 3) Ship the product to our designated service center (shipping costs are borne by the customer).
faq_void_answer: The warranty is voided by: damage from misuse, negligence, accidents, or unauthorized modifications; normal wear and tear, including cosmetic damage; damage due to improper installation, operation, or maintenance; products repaired by unauthorized personnel; loss or theft of the product; and accessories, consumables, or parts subject to regular replacement (e.g., batteries, cables).
faq_transfer_answer: No, our warranty is non-transferable and applies only to the original purchaser with valid proof of purchase.
faq_international_answer: No, our warranty is only valid within Thailand. International customers will need to ship products back to Thailand for warranty service at their own expense.
warranty_exclusions: This warranty does not cover: damage caused by misuse, negligence, accidents, or unauthorized modifications; normal wear and tear, including cosmetic damage; damage due to improper installation, operation, or maintenance; products that have been repaired or serviced by unauthorized personnel; loss or theft of the product; accessories, consumables, or parts subject to regular replacement (e.g., batteries, cables).
warranty_claim_process: To claim the warranty, the customer must: 1) Contact our support team at support@siamtechonline.com with proof of purchase (receipt or invoice), 2) Provide a detailed description of the issue, including photos or videos if applicable, 3) Ship the product to our designated service center (shipping costs are borne by the customer).
warranty_resolution: Upon receiving the defective product, the Company will inspect and determine the warranty eligibility. If approved, we will, at our discretion: repair the product at no cost, replace the product with an identical or equivalent model, or provide a partial or full refund if repair or replacement is not possible.
limitation_liability: The Company shall not be liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of its products. This warranty is the sole and exclusive remedy available to customers.
governing_law: This warranty policy is governed by the laws of Thailand. Any disputes shall be resolved in the jurisdiction where the Company is registered.
